haskell-unliftio-core: The MonadUnliftIO typeclass for unlifting monads to IO

haskell-wai-extra: Provides some basic WAI handlers and middleware.

haskell-warp-tls: HTTP over TLS support for Warp via the TLS package
haskell-wcwidth: Bindings for your system's native wcwidth
haskell-websockets: A sensible and clean way to write WebSocket-capable servers in Haskell.
haskell-weigh: Measure allocations of a Haskell functions/values
haskell-with-location: Use ImplicitParams-based source locations in a backward compatible way
haskell-wizards: High level, generic library for interrogative user interfaces
haskell-wl-pprint-extras: A free monad based on the Wadler/Leijen pretty printer

haskell-wl-pprint-text: A Wadler/Leijen Pretty Printer for Text values
haskell-x11: A Haskell binding to the X11 graphics library.
haskell-x11-xft: Bindings to the Xft, X Free Type interface library, and some Xrender parts

haskell-x509-system: Handle per-operating-system X.509 accessors and storage
haskell-xcb-types: Parses XML files used by the XCB project

haskell-xdg-basedir: A basic implementation of the XDG Base Directory specification

haskell-yesod-core: Creation of type-safe, RESTful web applications.
haskell-yesod-default: Default config and main functions for your yesod application (deprecated)

haskell-yesod-persistent: Some helpers for using Persistent from Yesod.

haskell-zlib: Compression and decompression in the gzip and zlib formats
haskell-zlib-bindings: Low-level bindings to the zlib package.
hasktags: Produces ctags "tags" and etags "TAGS" files for Haskell programs
hatari: An Atari ST and STE emulator
hcxdumptool: Small tool to capture packets from wlan devices
hcxkeys: Set of tools to generate plainmasterkeys (rainbowtables) and hashes for hashcat and John the Ripper
hcxtools: Portable solution for capturing wlan traffic and conversion to hashcat and John the Ripper formats

hdf5: General purpose library and file format for storing scientific data

heartbeat-elastic: Ping remote services for availability and log results to Elasticsearch or send to Logstash

heimdall: Tool suite used to flash firmware (ROMs) onto Samsung Galaxy S devices
helm: A cross-platform, polyphonic synthesizer, available standalone and as an LV2 plugin

hevea: A quite complete and fast LATEX to HTML translator
